adHeader: MOBILE REPAIR SERVICE & GREAT PRICES TOO! - CALL THE EXPERTS!
adDetails: WHETHER ITS BRAKES, AN OIL CHANGE , A TUNEUP , BELTS OR HOSES REPLACED, OR - SHOCKS -- WE CAN HANDLE IT! WE HAVE A SELF-CONTAINED MOBILE TRUCK READY TO COME TO YOUR LOCATION TO DO ANY NEEDED REPAIR WORK . CALL US NOW FOR A PRICE QUOTE. WE SERVICE AND REPAIR IMPORTED AND DOMESTIC CARS AND LIGHT TRUCKS - MEDIUM DUTY TRUCKS UP TO 5 TONS - AND RVS. WE REPAIR OR SERVICE BRAKES - TUNEUPS - OIL CHANGES - TIMING BELTS - WATER PUMPS - BELTS & HOSES SUSPENSION - BATTERIES - STARTERS - ALTERNATORS, AND MUCH MORE. CALL AND ASK US IF WE CAN REPAIR YOUR VEHICLE'S PROBLEM. CALL show contact info ASK FOR AL. YOU'LL BE GLAD YOU DID.
